scripts.push-arm: npm run build && npm run tag-arm && docker push --all-tags adessilly/php-composer
scripts.push-amd64: npm run build && npm run tag-amd64 && docker push --all-tags adessilly/php-composer
scripts.merge-manifest-version: docker manifest create adessilly/php-composer:`cat version.txt` adessilly/php-composer:`cat version.txt`-arm adessilly/php-composer:`cat version.txt`-amd64 && docker manifest annotate adessilly/php-composer:`cat version.txt` adessilly/php-composer:`cat version.txt`-arm --arch arm64 && docker manifest push adessilly/php-composer:`cat version.txt`
scripts.merge-manifest-latest: docker manifest create adessilly/php-composer:latest adessilly/php-composer:`cat version.txt`-arm adessilly/php-composer:`cat version.txt`-amd64 && docker manifest annotate adessilly/php-composer:latest adessilly/php-composer:`cat version.txt`-arm --arch arm && docker manifest push adessilly/php-composer:latest
